title: What to Wear Now: A White Dress
subtitle: IT’S A BLANK CANVAS, SO LEAN ON CHIC ACCESSORIES TO CREATE A STANDOUT LOOK

metadata.excerpt: Play up the beachy vibes of this breezy dress with braided metallic slides, an embellished tote and reflective sunnies.

components.text: It’s a blank canvas, so lean on chic accessories to create a standout look

caption.text: Selena Gomez in Prada on June 12.
Blake Lively in Reformation on June 11.

components.text: From left: Selena Gomez in Prada on June 12; Blake Lively in Reformation on June 11.
Play up the beachy vibes of this breezy dress with braided metallic slides, an embellished tote and reflective sunnies.
This crisp style looks work-appropriate with classic loafers, a structured handbag and a sophisticated watch.

Sale Alert!
Snag this dress and more bargains at the Nordstrom Anniversary Sale beginning 7/6 for card members and 7/15 for all
Statement accessories, like floral-print wedges, a beaded bag and a bold headband, give this eyelet sundress a festive upgrade.
